control.definition: <fd:RB_Req1 beanName="applicationData" property="quiz.typeOfApplicant" key="EQ-1.1.a" noOfKeys="3" required="true" questionKey="EQ-1.1.pagetext.1" requireLightBox="2" pageid="1.1"/>
<fd:Date beanName="applicationData" property="quiz.cprExpiryDate" required="true" key="EQ-2.1.pagetext.1" futureDateAllowed="true" startYear="1940" endYear="2035"/>
<fd:RB_Req1 beanName="applicationData" property="quiz.reasonForApplication" key="EQ-2.2.a" noOfKeys="7" required="true" questionKey="EQ-2.2.pagetext.1"/>
<fd:RB_Req1 beanName="applicationData" property="quiz.twoYearGreenCard" key="EQ-2.3.a" noOfKeys="4" required="true" questionKey="EQ-2.3.pagetext.1"/>

<i90premium:EQ-Reminder beanName="applicationData" property="quiz.gcReminder.textReminder" key="EQ-3.4" gcExpiryDate='<%= applicationData.getQuiz().getExpiryDate()%>' reminderDate='<%= applicationData.getQuiz().getReminderDate()%>' emailID='<%= applicationData.getQuiz().getGcReminder().getEmailAddress()%>' reminderType='<%= applicationData.getQuiz().getReminderType()%>' subheaderTwoYear="EQ-3.4.subHeaderTextTwoYear" subheaderTenYear="EQ-3.4.subHeaderTextTenYear" subheaderInstruction1="EQ-3.4.remindText1" subheaderInstruction2="EQ-3.4.remindText2" titleOptionalKey="EQ-3.4.1.optionalKey" noOfKeys="2" optionalKeyOrder="1" required="true" questionKey="EQ-3.4.sectionheader1"/>
<i90premium:EQ-Reminder_Phone beanName="applicationData" property="quiz.gcReminder.telephone" key="EQ-3.5.question1" instructionText="EQ-3.5.question1.instruction" required="true" onlyUS="true"/>

applicationForm.name: i90premium

property.value: I-90 - Application to Replace Permanent Resident Card.

applicationForm.description: Application to Replace Permanent Resident Card

control.definition: <fd:Name_FirstMiddleLast beanName="applicationData" property="applicant.name" mask="elisname" required="true" middleMaxLength="30" firstMaxLength="30" lastMaxLength="30" value="true" firstNameKey="control.name.legalFirst" middleNameKey="control.name.legalMiddle" lastNameKey="control.name.legalLast" controlHeaderKey="SQ-1.1.sectionheader1" instructionText="SQ-1.1.instructionText" maskKey="control.gc.maskerror" middleNameCheckBoxKey="control.name.checkBoxMiddle"/>
<fd:Gender beanName="applicationData" property="applicant.sex" required="true" key="SQ-1.1.label1"/>

<fd:Date beanName="applicationData" property="applicant.birth.dateOfBirth" required="true" futureDateAllowed="false" futureDateAllowedErrorKey="errors.dateOfBirth" startYearErrorKey="control.date.errordate" key="SQ-1.1.2.label1" />
<i90premium:I90_COB beanName="applicationData" property="applicant.birth.countryOfBirth" required="true" key="SQ-1.1.2.label2"/>
<fd:InputBox_Small beanName="applicationData" property="applicant.birth.cityOfBirth" required="true" maxLength="30" mask="elisname" maskKey="control.liberalmaskerror" key="SQ-1.1.2.label3" />

<fd:Address beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.residenceAddress" controlHeaderKey="SQ-1.1.3.sectionheader1" subLabelKey="SQ-1.1.3a.sublabel" subLabel="true" required="true" zipcodeMaxLength="10" cityMaxLength="20" streetMaxLength="40" apartmentMaxLength="6" requireOtherOption="true" requireAddressStandardizationValidation="true" addressStandardizationProperty="formSpecific.residenceAddressStandardisationResponse"/>

<fd:YesNo_NoDefault beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.sameAsMailingAddress" errorKey="error.control.pleaseselect" yesLabel="control.yes" noLabel="control.no" questionKey="SQ-1.1.3.label1" onYesClick="onShowHide();" onNoClick="onShowHide();" required="true"/>

<fd:RB_Req1 beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.residenceAddress.hasInCareOfAgent" required="true" questionKey="SQ-1.1.3.label2.pagetext.1" key="SQ-1.1.3.label2" noOfKeys="2" errorKey="error.control.pleaseselect" onClick="ShowContentRBReq1('section-1.1.3.3','applicationData-formSpecific.residenceAddress.hasInCareOfAgent-2');" pageid="1.1.3" requireLightBox="header" personalisation="true" prProperty="applicant.optionalFullName"/>

<fd:InputBox_Small beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.residenceAddress.inCareOfAgentName" required="true" maxLength="34" mask="elisname" maskKey="control.liberalmaskerror" key="SQ-1.1.3.label3" />

<fd:Address beanName="applicationData" property="applicant.homeAddressInCareOf" required="true" controlHeaderKey="SQ-1.1.3.sectionheader2" subLabelKey="SQ-1.1.3e.sublabel" subLabel="true" zipcodeMaxLength="10" streetMaxLength="40" apartmentMaxLength="6" requireLightBox="header" pageid="1.1.3e" requireOtherOption="true" requireAddressStandardizationValidation="true" addressStandardizationProperty="formSpecific.homeAddressStandardisationResponse"/>

<script type="text/javascript">

                                    onShowHide();
                                    function onShowHide(){

                                    HideContent('section-1.1.3.4');
                                    enableRepeaterValidation('section-1.1.3.4');

                                    if(document.getElementById("applicationData-formSpecific.sameAsMailingAddress-no") && document.getElementById("applicationData-formSpecific.sameAsMailingAddress-no").checked){
                                        ShowContent('section-1.1.3.4');
                                    }else{
                                        disableRepeaterValidation('section-1.1.3.4');
                                    }

                                    }

                            </script>

<fd:Address_Validation_Confirmation beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.validAddress" formName="mainForm" userAddressTitle="SQ-1.1.3.1.1.label1" standardizedAddressTitle="SQ-1.1.3.1.1.label2" controlHeaderKey="SQ-1.1.3.1.1.heading" required="true" />

<fd:CheckBox_Address_Validation 	beanName="applicationData"
                                                                            property="formSpecific.sureAboutMyMailingAddress"
                                                                            addressProperty="formSpecific.validAddress"
                                                                            value="true"
                                                                            questionKey="SQ-1.1.3.1.2.label1"
                                                                            key="SQ-1.1.3.1.2.label2"
                                                                            instructionText="SQ-1.1.3.1.2.label1.instructionText"
                                                                            instructionExplain="unableToVerifyMailingAddress"
                                                                            pageid="1.1.3.1.2b"
                                                                            required="true"/>
                                                                            <script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript">
                                                                            <!-- Temporary jQuery to add open/close functionality to `QuestionAdditionalInstructions` component -->
                                                                            $('.QuestionAdditionalInstructions-openLink').on('click', function(event) {
                                                                            event.preventDefault();
                                                                            $(this).closest('.QuestionAdditionalInstructions').addClass('QuestionAdditionalInstructions-open');
                                                                            });
                                                                            $('.QuestionAdditionalInstructions-closeLink').on('click', function(event) {
                                                                            event.preventDefault();
                                                                            $(this).closest('.QuestionAdditionalInstructions').removeClass('QuestionAdditionalInstructions-open');
                                                                            });
                                                                            $('.QuestionAdditionalInstructions-titleBar, .QuestionAdditionalInstructions-openLink, .QuestionAdditionalInstructions-closeLink').on('click', function(event) {
                                                                            event.preventDefault();
                                                                            $(this).closest('.QuestionAdditionalInstructions').toggleClass('QuestionAdditionalInstructions-open');
                                                                            });
                                                                            </script>

<fd:RB_Req1 beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.havePhotoCopy" key="SQ-3.1.4.label1" instructionText="SQ-3.1.4.label1.instructionText" noOfKeys="3" required="true" questionKey="SQ-3.1.4.label1" onClick="showHideGreenCard();"/>

<i90premium:ARN_RadioButton beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.typeOfGreenCard" key="SQ-3.1.4.question2" noOfImages="4" required="true" divId="typeOfGreenCard" onClick="showHideGreenCard();"/>

<i90premium:ARN_RadioButton beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.typeOfGreenCardNoPhotoCopy" key="SQ-3.1.4.question2" noOfImages="4" required="true" divId="typeOfGreenCardNoPhotoCopy" onClick="showHideGreenCard();"/>

<fd:InputBox_Small_ARN beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.legalCardARN" mask="anumber" key="SQ-3.1.4.label2" required="true" maskKey="arn.maskError" value="true" arnLabelDivId="arnLabelDiv" arnQuestionSpanId="arnQuestionSpan"/>
<i90premium:ARN_Image imageId="anumber" />
<i90premium:I90_GreenCard_Category beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.classOfAdmission" required="true" key="SQ-3.1.4.label3" instructionText="SQ-3.1.4.label3.instructionText1"/>
<i90premium:ARN_Image imageId="categoryCode" />
<fd:Date beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.gcExpirationDate" required="true" key="SQ-3.1.4.label5" value="true" requireCheckBox="true" checkBoxKey="SQ-3.1.4.label5.checkbox"/>
<i90premium:ARN_Image imageId="expirationDate" />

<fd:Date beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.residenceSincePrintedOnGC" required="true" key="SQ-3.1.4.label4" futureDateAllowed="false" startYearErrorKey="control.date.errordate" futureDateAllowedErrorKey="error.dateOfResidence"/>
<i90premium:ARN_Image imageId="residenceSinceDate" />

<fd:InputBox_Small_ARN beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.legalARN" mask="anumber" key="SQ-3.1.4.label6.nophotocopy" required="true" requireCheckBox="true" checkBoxKey="SQ-3.1.4.label6.checkbox" maskKey="arn.maskError" value="true" arnLabelDivId="arnLabelDivNpc" arnQuestionSpanId="arnQuestionSpanNpc" />
<i90premium:ARN_Image imageId="npc-anumber" />

<i90premium:PortOfEntry beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.categoryCode" required="true" key="SQ-3.1.4.label7" requireCheckBox="true" mask="alphanumeric" maxLength="10" checkBoxKey="SQ-3.1.4.label7.checkbox" value="true"/>
<i90premium:ARN_Image imageId="npc-categoryCode" />

<fd:Date beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.gcExpirationDateEstimate" required="true" key="SQ-3.1.4.label9" requireCheckBox="true" checkBoxKey="SQ-3.1.4.label9.checkbox" instructionText="SQ-3.1.4.label9.instructionText1" value="true"/>
<i90premium:ARN_Image imageId="npc-expirationDate" />

<fd:Date beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.statusAdjustmentDate" required="true" key="SQ-3.1.4.label8" instructionText="SQ-3.1.4.label8.instructionText1" futureDateAllowed="false" startYearErrorKey="control.date.errordate" futureDateAllowedErrorKey="error.dateOfResidence"/>
<i90premium:ARN_Image imageId="npc-residenceSinceDate" />

<script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript">
                                        showHideGreenCard();

                                        function isTypeOfGreenCardSelected(){
                                            var typeOfGreenCard = document.getElementsByName("formSpecific.typeOfGreenCard");

                                            var anumber = document.getElementById("anumber");
                                            var categoryCode = document.getElementById("categoryCode");
                                            var expirationDate = document.getElementById("expirationDate");
                                            var residenceSinceDate = document.getElementById("residenceSinceDate");

                                            ShowContent('div-anumber');
                                            ShowContent('div-categoryCode');
                                            ShowContent('div-expirationDate');
                                            ShowContent('div-residenceSinceDate');
                                            deEmphaSizeSelectedPRCard(typeOfGreenCard,'typeOfGreenCard');

                                            for (var i = 0, len = typeOfGreenCard.length; i < len; i++) {
                                                if (typeOfGreenCard[i].checked) {
                                                    emphaSizeSelectedPRCard(typeOfGreenCard[i],"typeOfGreenCard",anumber,categoryCode,expirationDate,residenceSinceDate);
                                                    return true;
                                                }
                                            }
                                             return false;
                                        }

                                        function isTypeOfGreenCardNoPhotoCopySelected(){
                                            var typeOfGreenCardNoPhotoCopy = document.getElementsByName("formSpecific.typeOfGreenCardNoPhotoCopy");

                                            var npc_anumber = document.getElementById("npc-anumber");
                                            var npc_categoryCode = document.getElementById("npc-categoryCode");
                                            var npc_expirationDate = document.getElementById("npc-expirationDate");
                                            var npc_residenceSinceDate = document.getElementById("npc-residenceSinceDate");

                                            ShowContent('div-npc-anumber');
                                            ShowContent('div-npc-categoryCode');
                                            ShowContent('div-npc-expirationDate');
                                            ShowContent('div-npc-residenceSinceDate');
                                            deEmphaSizeSelectedPRCard(typeOfGreenCardNoPhotoCopy,'typeOfGreenCardNoPhotoCopy');

                                            for (var i = 0, len = typeOfGreenCardNoPhotoCopy.length; i < len; i++) {
                                                if (typeOfGreenCardNoPhotoCopy[i].checked) {
                                                    emphaSizeSelectedPRCard(typeOfGreenCardNoPhotoCopy[i],"typeOfGreenCardNoPhotoCopy",npc_anumber,npc_categoryCode,npc_expirationDate,npc_residenceSinceDate);
                                                    return true;
                                                }
                                            }
                                             return false;
                                        }

                                        function deEmphaSizeSelectedPRCard(prType,prName){
                                            for (var i = 0, len = prType.length; i < len; i++) {
                                                $("#"+prName+prType[i].value).removeClass("Active");
                                            }
                                        }

                                        function emphaSizeSelectedPRCard(prType,prName,anumber,categoryCode,expirationDate,residenceSinceDate){
                                            $("#"+prName+prType.value).addClass("Active");

                                            anumber.src = "appImages/arn"+ prType.value + "-anumber.png";
                                            categoryCode.src = "appImages/arn"+ prType.value + "-categorycode.png";
                                            expirationDate.src = "appImages/arn"+ prType.value + "-expirationdate.png";
                                            residenceSinceDate.src = "appImages/arn"+ prType.value + "-residencesincedate.png";

                                            var arnQuestionSpan = document.getElementById("arnQuestionSpan");
                                            var arnLabelDiv = document.getElementById("arnLabelDiv");

                                            if(prType.value == 1 || prType.value == 5){
                                                arnQuestionSpan.innerHTML = "<fmt:message key='SQ-3.1.4.label6.1'/>"
                                                arnLabelDiv.innerHTML = "<label><fmt:message key='arn.label.1'/></label>"
                                            }
                                            if(prType.value == 2){
                                                arnQuestionSpan.innerHTML = "<fmt:message key='SQ-3.1.4.label6.2'/>"
                                                arnLabelDiv.innerHTML = "<label><fmt:message key='arn.label.2'/></label>"
                                            }
                                            if(prType.value == 3){
                                                arnQuestionSpan.innerHTML = "<fmt:message key='SQ-3.1.4.label6.3'/>"
                                                arnLabelDiv.innerHTML = "<label><fmt:message key='arn.label.3'/></label>"
                                            }
                                            if(prType.value == 4){
                                                arnQuestionSpan.innerHTML = "<fmt:message key='SQ-3.1.4.label6.4'/>"
                                                arnLabelDiv.innerHTML = "<label><fmt:message key='arn.label.4'/></label>"
                                            }

                                            var gcImageDivName = "div";
                                            if(prName == 'typeOfGreenCardNoPhotoCopy'){
                                                gcImageDivName = "div-npc";
                                            }

                                            if(prType.value == 5) {
                                                HideContent(gcImageDivName+'-anumber');
                                                HideContent(gcImageDivName+'-categoryCode');
                                                HideContent(gcImageDivName+'-expirationDate');
                                                HideContent(gcImageDivName+'-residenceSinceDate');
                                            }
                                        }

                                        function showHideGreenCard(){
                                            HideContent('section-3.1.4.2');
                                            HideContent('section-3.1.4.3');
                                            HideContent('section-3.1.4.4');
                                            HideContent('section-3.1.4.5');
                                            if (document.getElementById('applicationData-formSpecific.havePhotoCopy-1').checked == true){
                                                ShowContent('section-3.1.4.2');
                                                if(isTypeOfGreenCardSelected()) {
                                                    ShowContent('section-3.1.4.4');
                                                }
                                            }
                                            if(document.getElementById('applicationData-formSpecific.havePhotoCopy-2').checked == true || document.getElementById('applicationData-formSpecific.havePhotoCopy-3').checked == true) {

                                                var arnQuestionSpan = document.getElementById("arnQuestionSpanNpc");
                                                var arnLabelDiv = document.getElementById("arnLabelDivNpc");

                                                arnQuestionSpan.innerHTML = "<fmt:message key='SQ-3.1.4.label6.nophotocopy'/>"
                                                arnLabelDiv.innerHTML = "<label><fmt:message key='arn.label.1'/></label>"

                                                HideContent('div-anumber');
                                                HideContent('div-categoryCode');
                                                HideContent('div-expirationDate');
                                                HideContent('div-residenceSinceDate');
                                                HideContent('div-npc-anumber');
                                                HideContent('div-npc-categoryCode');
                                                HideContent('div-npc-expirationDate');
                                                HideContent('div-npc-residenceSinceDate');
                                                ShowContent('section-3.1.4.5');
                                            }
                                        }
                                    </script>

<i90premium:CheckBox beanName="applicationData" property="applicant.applicantCertification" required="true" value="true" instructionExplain="true" instructionText="SQ-3.1.4.1.label1.instructionText" key="SQ-3.1.4.1.label1" pageid="3.1.4.1" imagePath="appImages/uscis.png" questionKey="SQ-3.1.4.1.questionKey"/>

                                            onShowHideCorrection();
                                            function onShowHideCorrection(){
                                            HideContent('section-3.2.2');
                                            HideContent('section-3.2.3');
                                            HideContent('section-3.2.4');
                                            HideContent('section-3.2.5');
                                            if (document.getElementById('applicationData-formSpecific.informationIncorrect.optionList[1].value-1').checked == true){
                                            ShowContent('section-3.2.2');
                                            }
                                            if (document.getElementById('applicationData-formSpecific.informationIncorrect.optionList[3].value-3').checked == true){
                                            ShowContent('section-3.2.3');
                                            }
                                            if (document.getElementById('applicationData-formSpecific.informationIncorrect.optionList[4].value-4').checked == true){
                                            ShowContent('section-3.2.4');
                                            }
                                            if (document.getElementById('applicationData-formSpecific.informationIncorrect.optionList[5].value-5').checked == true){
                                            ShowContent('section-3.2.5');
                                            }
                                            }
                                    </script>

<fd:YesNo_NoDefault_Explain beanName="applicationData" property="formSpecific.arrestedForSeriousCrime" yesNoErrorKey="error.control.pleaseselect" explainErrorKey="control.text.mandatoryerror" questionKey="SQ-4.2.1.label2" instructionText="SQ-4.2.1.instructionText" onYesClick="showHideCrimes();" onNoClick="showHideCrimes();" explainKey="SQ-4.2.1.explainKey" required="true"/>

<script type="text/javascript">
                                        function showHideCrimes() {
                                            HideContent('section-4.2.1.2');
                                            HideContent('section-4.2.1.3');
                                            enableRepeaterValidation('section-4.2.1.2');
                                            enableRepeaterValidation('section-4.2.1.3');

                                            if(document.getElementById('applicationData-formSpecific.anyCrime-yes').checked) {
                                                ShowContent('section-4.2.1.2');
                                                if(document.getElementById('applicationData-formSpecific.arrestedForSeriousCrime.yesno-yes').checked){
                                                    ShowContent('section-4.2.1.3');
                                                } else {
                                                    disableRepeaterValidation('section-4.2.1.3');
                                                }
                                            } else {
                                                disableRepeaterValidation('section-4.2.1.3');
                                                disableRepeaterValidation('section-4.2.1.2');
                                            }
                                        }
                                        </script>
